long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the mysterious world of Wednesday with a captivating live wallpaper that brings the charm of the Addams family to your Chrome new tab.

The Wednesday Live Wallpaper captures the essence of Wednesday Addams, showcasing her dark humor and unique style. Each new tab immerses you in her gothic universe, filled with intrigue and whimsy, making every browsing session an adventure.

Features:

Wednesday Live Wallpaper
Google search bar
Addable and removable shortcuts
Date and time display

This Chrome extension combines a stunning chrome wallpaper with essential features for an enhanced browsing experience. As one of the best chrome live wallpapers, it adds personality to your chrome background while maintaining functionality.

For more exciting live wallpapers, explore Gameograf.com. Discover extensions like: Enid Sinclair Live Wallpaper, Morticia Addams Live Wallpaper, Gomez Addams Live Wallpaper, Pugsley Addams Live Wallpaper, Uncle Fester Live Wallpaper.
